content: I think the idea of worldbuilding as method acting is a good one, although my focus here was not really on the process of planning or pre-writing as much as the process of reading and evaluating literature. The amount of worldbuiding that goes into pre-writing can be quite different than the amount of worldbuilding that actually makes it on the page. I do think that whatever works for a writer is, well, whatever works. If worldbuilding helps a writer in the planning or editing stages, they should of course do it.
